rukus.text: Ibikomerezwa byo mu bantu ba Farawo biravuga biti “Mu by’ukuri uyu ni umurozi w’umuhanga”
“Arashaka kubakura mu gihugu cyanyu.” (Farawo arababaza ati) “Ese mwangira iyihe nama?”
Baramubwira bati “Ba umwihoreye (ntumwice) we n’umuvandimwe we [Haruna (Aroni)], maze wohereze (ingabo) mu mijyi yose zikoranye (abarozi).”
Nuko abarozi baza kwa Farawo, baramubwira bati “Ese koko turahabwa igihembo nituramuka dutsinze?”
(Farawo) aravuga ati “Ni byo (muzagororerwa), kandi muzaba bamwe mu byegera (byanjye).”
Baravuga bati “Yewe Musa! urahitamo kubanza kunaga (inkoni yawe), cyangwa abe ari twe tubanza kunaga?”
(Musa) aravuga ati “Mwe nimunage.” Nuko banaze, barindagiza amaso y’abantu banabakura imitima, bagaragaza uburozi buhambaye
Maze duhishurira Musa tumubwira tuti “Naga inkoni yawe!” (Ayinaze ihinduka inzoka nini) ihita imiragura ibyo bari bamaze guhimba (ibirozi)
Nuko ukuri kurigaragaza, maze ibyo bakoze bihinduka imfabusa

Farawo aravuga ati “Ni gute mumwemeye mbere y’uko mbibahera uburenganzira? Mu by’ukuri uyu ni umugambi mwacuriye mu mujyi kugira ngo muwirukanemo abawutuye, ariko muraza kumenya (icyo nza kubakorera)!”
Rwose ndaza kubaca amaboko n’amaguru byanyu imbusane, maze mbabambe mwese
Baravuga bati “Mu by’ukuri tuzasubira kwa Nyagasani wacu.”
“Kandi nta kindi uduhora uretse kuba twemeye ibitangaza bya Nyagasani wacu ubwo byatugeragaho. Nyagasani wacu! Duhe kwihangana kandi uduhe gupfa turi Abayisilamu.”
